4 /** \file
5  * Defines the code-generator for producing ARM machine code
6  */
7 
8 #include <utility>
9 
10 #include "CodeGen_Posix.h"
11 
12 namespace Halide {
13 
14 struct Target;
15 
16 namespace Internal {
17 
18 /** A code generator that emits ARM code from a given Halide stmt. */
19 class CodeGen_ARM : public CodeGen_Posix {
20 public:
21  /** Create an ARM code generator for the given arm target. */
22  CodeGen_ARM(const Target &);
23 
24 protected:
25  using CodeGen_Posix::visit;
26 
27  /** Assuming 'inner' is a function that takes two vector arguments, define a wrapper that
28  * takes one vector argument and splits it into two to call inner. */
29  llvm::Function *define_concat_args_wrapper(llvm::Function *inner, const std::string &name);
30  void init_module() override;
31 
32  /** Nodes for which we want to emit specific neon intrinsics */
33  // @{
34  void visit(const Cast *) override;
35  void visit(const Sub *) override;
36  void visit(const Mul *) override;
37  void visit(const Min *) override;
38  void visit(const Max *) override;
39  void visit(const Store *) override;
40  void visit(const Load *) override;
41  void visit(const Call *) override;
42  void visit(const LT *) override;
43  void visit(const LE *) override;
44  void codegen_vector_reduce(const VectorReduce *, const Expr &) override;
45  // @}
46 
47  /** Various patterns to peephole match against */
48  struct Pattern {
49  std::string intrin; ///< Name of the intrinsic
50  Expr pattern; ///< The pattern to match against
51  Pattern() = default;
52  Pattern(const std::string &intrin, Expr p)
53  : intrin(intrin), pattern(std::move(p)) {
54  }
55  };
56  std::vector<Pattern> casts, averagings, negations;
57 
58  std::string mcpu() const override;
59  std::string mattrs() const override;
60  bool use_soft_float_abi() const override;
61  int native_vector_bits() const override;
62 
63  // NEON can be disabled for older processors.
64  bool neon_intrinsics_disabled() {
65  return target.has_feature(Target::NoNEON);
66  }
67 };
68 
69 } // namespace Internal
70 } // namespace Halide
